articles.title: Anniversary of Democratic Front for Reunification of Korea Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Democratic Front for Reunification of Korea Marked
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture Thursday to mark the 70th anniversary of the formation of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea (DFRK).
					 The DFRK formed by President Kim Il Sung is a nationwide united front umbrella which most correctly reflects the common desire of the patriotic and democratic political parties, public organizations and people from all walks of life in the north and the south and abroad to establish the sovereignty of the nation throughout Korea and achieve the cause of national reunification by the concerted efforts of all the Koreans and the requirements of the developing revolution.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, Ro Tu Chol, the chairman of the C.C., the Korean Social Democratic Party, presidium members of the C.C., the DFRK, officials of public organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials concerned, former unconverted long-term prisoners, working people in Pyongyang and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 The formation of the DFRK by Kim Il Sung 70 years ago was a historic event which provided an epochal occasion in preventing the perpetuation of territorial division by outsiders, achieving the complete independence and sovereignty of the nation and reunifying the country, the reporter said.
					
					 He noted that Kim Il Sung put forward the original idea and line on forming a democratic and national united front grouping the patriotic and democratic political parties and public organizations and people of all social standings and convened the Meeting of Representatives of the Democratic Political Parties and Pubic Organizations in North Korea in Pyongyang on July 22, Juche 35 (1946).
					
					 In view of the grave crisis in which the territorial division and national split might be prolonged due to the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the Synman Rhee puppet clique to fabricate "separate elections and separate government" which might lead to ruin, Kim Il Sung held the Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Public Organizations in North and South Korea, a historic assembly of all parties, factions and figures of the north and the south, in Pyongyang in April 1948, the reporter said.
					
					 He noted that Kim Il Sung convened a meeting to be attended by representatives of more than 70 political parties and public organizations in the north and the south and abroad on June 26, 1949 and made sure that the nationwide DFRK was formed, thus providing a sure guarantee for developing the movement for united front onto a higher stage.
					
					 Since its formation the DFRK has recorded annals of its proud struggle and victory while powerfully arousing all Koreans to the patriotic struggle for reunification in line with its mission and duty, the reporter said.
					
					 The cause of national reunification is sure to win thanks to the outstanding and tested guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the reporter concluded.

articles.title: Government of Russian Federation Donates Food to DPRK
articles.content:
Government of Russian Federation Donates Food to DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Food donated by the government of the Russian Federation through the WFP arrived at Nampho Port Wednesday. Similar donation was made by it in December last year.
					 The charge d'affaires ad interim and staff members of the Russian Embassy and staff members of the WFP mission here watched the discharge of food on Friday.
					
					 The food donation will contribute to boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Spokesman for National Peace Committee of Korea Condemns THAAD Deployment in S. Korea
articles.content:
Spokesman for National Peace Committee of Korea Condemns THAAD Deployment in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- All Koreans in the north, the south and abroad should never tolerate the traitor Park Geun Hye regime's criminal moves to deploy THAAD but turn out as one in the nation-wide struggle to resolutely check and foil them, said a spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea in a statement on Friday.
					 Referring to the daily mounting actions of south Koreans of various circles against the Park regime's decision to allow the U.S. aggressor forces to deploy THAAD in south Korea, the statement said, and noted:
					
					 This is an eruption of unbearable hatred and resentment of the public at the Park regime which makes no scruple of leaving the territory of the Korean nation and all its members to tender mercy of the U.S. imperialists keen to ignite a nuclear war and brings a new Cold War to Northeast Asia, hell-bent on confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north and sycophancy toward the U.S. and treachery. 
					
					 Branding the Park regime's sycophancy to the U.S. as an unpardonable act of sycophancy and treachery, the National Peace Committee of Korea vehemently denounces this in the name of all Koreans.
					
					 Owing to the Park group's foolish decision to deploy THAAD, south Korea is now being reduced to the U.S. nuclear outpost for aggression and a hotbed of a nuclear war and the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia is looming as potential one.
					
					 Traitor Park Geun Hye is making desperate efforts to escape ruin in return for leaving the interests of the nation to the tender mercy of her U.S. master and realize her wild ambition for escalating the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north but she is bound to meet the final doom as she is adding to the indelible crimes committed against the nation.
					
					 Park would be well advised to properly know that she is sadly mistaken if she calculates she can escape the just strike of the DPRK even a bit through the deployment of THAAD.
					
					 On this opportunity, we extend positive support and firm solidarity to the south Korean people in their just struggle for defusing the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula, having the U.S. imperialists' aggressive and murderous weapons and bases dismantled and ensuring peace and stability in Northeast Asia.

articles.title: Egyptian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Egyptian Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Iman Mostafa Abdou Ahmed, Egyptian Ambassador to the DPRK, Friday gave a reception at his embassy to mark the 64th anniversary of the July 23 revolution in Egypt.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Egypt Friendship Association, Sin Hong Chol, Sim Kuk Ryong, So Ho Won and other officials concerned.
					
					 It was attended by staff members of the embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from President of DR Congo
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from President of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from Joseph Kabila Kabange, president of the Democratic Republic of Congo, on July 15.
					 The president in the message sent his warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un upon his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK on behalf of all people of DR Congo and on his own behalf.
					
					 The president expressed his will to further the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation for the happiness of the people of the two countries.

articles.title: Remains of More War Martyrs Buried
articles.content:
Remains of More War Martyrs Buried
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Remains of martyrs Yu Ki Hang, Pae Pyong Uk and Kim Chun Gil were buried at the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery ahead of the war victory day.
					 DPRK Hero Yu shot to death over 150 troops of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces through the snipers team campaign in various battles including the one to defend the line of Mundung-ri, Kangwon Province true to the order of President Kim Il Sung during the war.
					
					 He upheld the great leaders' ideology and leadership with arms by serving in the army all his life. He worked as head of a department and a lecturer at the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum.
					
					 Pae made sure that his company killed or wounded at least 1,170 enemy troops and destroyed or captured over 30 enemy tanks and vehicles in over 30 battles such as the one for liberating Songchon and advanced into Pyongyang before any other units and hoisted flags of the DPRK on top of buildings during the battle for its liberation.
					
					 Kim bravely fought in the battles for crossing the Kum River and the Raktong River and ensured the wartime railway transport by defusing more than 20 time bombs and over 2,700 butterfly bombs.
					
					 The remains of martyrs Ham Song Phil, Yu Ki Hang, Kim Chun Gil, Pak Song Hwan, Pak Si Ryul, Jong Tong Chang, Ri Sok Gu, Kim Yong Bae, Jon Ki Chol, Kim Pyong Gwon, Ko To Sik, Ri O Jung, Kim Sung Ho, Kim Chang Bok, Kim Yong Chan and their wives were also buried there.

articles.title: Homepage "Hwanggumsan" Opened in Local Network
articles.content:
Homepage "Hwanggumsan" Opened in Local Network
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- A new homepage "Hwanggumsan" is recently opened in local network of the DPRK.
					The homepage, run by the Central Nursery under the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection, offers over 12,000 data on forest science and technology, including e-books and multimedia.
					
					Subscribers can access advanced forest technologies and their development and get answers about problems arising in sapling production, cultivation and others.
					
					The homepage also deals with products of the nursery and species of trees cultivated by it.
					
					In the DPRK, tree-planting and forest conservation are greatly encouraged as the major preoccupation of all the people.

articles.title: Performance Given by Art Groups of KPA Officers' Wives
articles.content:
Performance Given by Art Groups of KPA Officers' Wives
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- A performance of amateur art groups of officers' wives of units of the Korean People's Army (KPA) selected in the sixth round of the second-term art performance contest of KPA officers' wives is going on at the People's Palace of Culture.
					 Put on the stage were chorus revolutionary hymn "Song in Praise of General Kim Jong Un", quartet "Best Wishes of People", etc. telling the audience the truth that there are prosperity of  the socialist country and happiness of families only when the people trust and follow  supreme leader Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Also staged were numbers depicting the officers' families reliably standing guard over the outpost for devotedly defending the leader and those on anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. and working class education.
					
					 Put on the stage were numbers dealing with the worthwhile, optimistic and cheerful life of the officers' wives upholding the Songun leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea on the first line as assistants to their husbands and mothers of soldiers.
					
					 Among the audience were officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, service personnel, servicemen's wives, creators and artistes in the field of literature and arts and Pyongyangites.

articles.title: Socialist Emulation Campaign Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Socialist Emulation Campaign Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- A 2016 spring commodity exhibition took place at the Pyongyang Underground Shop here some time ago.
					 On display there were more than 300 000 goods of several hundred kinds, presented by 30-odd units from Pyongyang and provinces of the country. The exhibition served as a significant momentum to intensify the emulation drive for producing better commodities among local industrial establishments.
					
					 In the DPRK a brisk socialist emulation drive is now going on in all the economic sectors to learn from and overtake advanced units in the work for updating production processes and turning out better products.
					
					 Such campaign has played an important role in speeding up the modernization of industrial establishments and the improvement of product quality, significantly contributing to shoring up the nation's economy as a whole.

articles.title: Big Efforts Being Paid to Preserving National Heritages in DPRK
articles.content:
Big Efforts Being Paid to Preserving National Heritages in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- It is gaining momentum in the DPRK to preserve national heritages.
					 The National Authority for the Protection of Cultural Heritage and relevant units are stepping up the work to refurbish history museums in every province and improve the preservation of historical relics across the country.
					
					 Necessary measures have also been taken to protect them during the rainy season.
					
					 It has been pushed forward to find and list national intangible cultural heritages and certify them together with their registration as world intangible cultural heritages. And the work for preserving scenic spots and natural monuments is going on in a creditable way.
					
					 Meanwhile, the establishment of geographical information system is on a steady progress to show the geographical position, genesis and preservative situation of each heritage with satellite images.

articles.title: Swimming Contest of Officials Held
articles.content:
Swimming Contest of Officials Held
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- There took place a swimming contest among officials of the commissions, ministries and national institutions at the swimming pool of the Changgwang Health Complex on Wednesday and Thursday.
					 The contest, divided into four groups, brought together hundreds of players.
					
					 The State Planning Commission, the General Bureau of Public Service, the Tin Ming Alan Commercial Center and the Foreign Languages Publishing House separately came first in groups.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Adhering to Self-Development-First Principle in 200-Day Campaign
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Adhering to Self-Development-First Principle in 200-Day Campaign 
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial calls for firmly adhering to the principle of self-development-first in the on-going heroic advance to dynamically usher in a golden age in building a socialist powerful country.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The self-development-first principle represents the revolutionary spirit of strengthening the driving force and paving one's way by depending on one's own efforts, technology and resources.
					
					 It reflects the indomitable, offensive and revolutionary idea of our Party and the unbreakable faith of our people.
					
					 It is the fundamental requirement for upholding and glorifying the independent revolutionary ideas and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il to give full rein to the spirit of self-development-first.
					
					 The spirit of the great leaders that one is the master of one's own destiny and one should hew out one's destiny by one's own efforts serves as a basic source of training our people to be ones with mental power who know nothing impossible and helping turn the DPRK into an invincible power.
					
					 It is an essential requirement for making a breakthrough towards implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development to fully display the spirit of self-development-first.
					
					 What is important for carrying out the above-said strategy is to give full rein to the spirit of self-development-first and settle all problems by dint of science and technology.
					
					 To fully display the spirit of self-development-first is an important requirement for frustrating the persistent moves of the imperialists and fully demonstrating the Mallima spirit of Juche Korea.

articles.title: Papers on Feats Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Performed for Developing United Front
articles.content:
Papers on Feats Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Performed for Developing United Front
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday carries an article on the lapse of seven decades since the formation of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea.
					 The article said:
					
					 The Committee of the Democratic National United Front of North Korea, the first united front organization after the liberation of the country, was formed in Pyongyang on July 22, Juche 35 (1946) under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung. And a meeting for forming the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea was held with the attendance of more than 70 progressive political parties and social organizations in the north, the south and abroad in June 1949 at a time when the nation-wide struggle for the great national unity and the country's reunification was mounting as the days went by.
					
					 The Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea is an organization of nationwide united front which reflects the common aspiration and wishes of patriotic and democratic political parties and social organizations and people from all walks of life to fully realize the sovereignty of the nation on a nationwide scale and achieve the country's reunification and nation's prosperity.
					
					 Its formation and development were the precious fruition of the united front line that the President laid down in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and consistently adhered to in the struggle for achieving the country's reunification.
					
					 The foresight and outstanding and tested guidance of leader Kim Jong Il served as an immortal leadership as he added shine to the President's idea of the great national unity and his leadership feats performed for developing the united front and ushered a new era of independent reunification.
					
					 The seven decades covered by the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea represent a proud history that fully demonstrated the truth and vitality of the Juche-based united front line of the great leaders and dynamically spurred the drive to achieve the national unity and the country's reunification under their leadership.
					
					 The Korean nation's desire for reunification will surely come true thanks to the precious tradition and experience gained by the great leaders in the united front movement and the outstanding and tested leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the cause of national reunification pioneered by the great leaders. 
					
					 Minju Joson in an editorial praises the idea and line of the great leaders on the great national unity and the immortal feats they performed in carrying out the cause of the national united front.

articles.title: KCTU Enters into General Strike
articles.content:
KCTU Enters into General Strike 
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) entered into a large-scale general strike across south Korea on July 20, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 The workers staged general strike at more than 250 worksites in 14 areas demanding the abrogation of anti-worker policy, stop to suppression of the KCTU, stop to restructuring sacrificing workers, wage-hike and ensuring of the rights of part-time workers, teachers and government employees.
					
					 The KCTU held a rally for the general strike with attendance of over 11,000 workers in Seoul.
					
					 Choe Jong Jin, acting chairman of the KCTU, said more than 50,000 workers including workers of public institutions, construction and metal fields and part-timers turned out in the general strike, adding that in Ulsan a joint strike is being waged by the branch of the Hyundai Motors of the Metal Workers' Trade Union and the Trade Union of the Hyundai Heavy Industry Co. Ltd.
					
					 Jo Sang Su, chairman of the Public Transport Trade Union, warned the Park Geun Hye regime that it would face indefinite general strike of workers in the fields of key industries and public service unless it withdraws the system of paying salaries according to piece rate aimed at illegal layoff by September 27.
					
					 The participants moved to the building of the "National Assembly" to hold another rally.
					
					 They branded the high-ranking bureaucrats of the "government" and the police, servants of the power, as dogs barking at their owners and the plutocrats as pigs as they betray even the people to meet their interests.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Forces Accused of Scheming to Cover up Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Forces Accused of Scheming to Cover up Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean ruling forces are getting desperate in helping Japan cover up the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 A plenary meeting was to be held by the women and family commission of the "National Assembly" on July 19 to pass the bill on accounts settlement of fiscal 2015 of the Ministry of Women and Family, according to News 1 of south Korea.
					
					 Prior to the meeting, the opposition camp in an opinion on the bill reportedly proposed including wordings such as completing the writing of a white paper on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army as early as possible and publishing it, and pressing ahead with patience with the work for having records on victims of the sexual slavery registered at UNESCO. 
					
					 Gentries of the ruling party, however, insisted on changing wordings.
					
					 Due to the desperate opposition from the ruling party, the plenary meeting failed to open and was put off.
					
					 Such behavior of the ruling "Saenuri Party" was an extension of its sinister moves to implement the humiliating "agreement" with Japan made on Dec. 28 last year.
					
					 South Koreans of various circles are critical of the sly trick of the ruling party to check the moves for building up public opinion on the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.

articles.title: Magazine of International Kothongryon Carries Special Write-up on Seventh Congress of WPK
articles.content:
Magazine of International Kothongryon Carries Special Write-up on Seventh Congress of WPK
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The International United Confederation of Koreans (International Kothongryon) made public the May-June issue of its monthly magazine Thongil.
					 The magazine carried a special write-up on the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea titled "The WPK, path of victory and glory".
					
					 It carried photos dealing with the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung in founding and developing the party.
					
					 It introduced in a chronological order the exploits the President performed by founding the party after the country's liberation and leading all party members and people until the Sixth Congress of the WPK.
					
					 It also carried photos of supreme leader Kim Jong Un guiding the Seventh Congress of the WPK and "3. For the Independent Reunification of the Country" from Kim Jong Un's Report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee and the opening and closing addresses made by him at the congress.
					
					 It carried an article titled "Kim Jong Il, immortal exploits performed by him in building the party" on the 52nd anniversary of his start of the work at the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					 It recalled that Kim Jong Un sent educational aid fund and stipends for the democratic national education of the children of Koreans in Japan on the 104th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It edited news that the medium long-range surface-to-surface strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-10 was successfully conducted under the guidance of Kim Jong Un and foreign press reports on it.
					
					 It carried an open letter sent by the North Side Preparatory Committee for the Joint Conference of Political Parties, Organizations and Individual Personages of the North and the South and Abroad for Peace and Independent Reunification of the Korean Peninsula to the organization of Koreans and individual figures in the region of the Commonwealth of Independent States and statements issued by a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry in denunciation of the U.S. policy for stifling the former.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Maritime Territory of Russia
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Maritime Territory of Russia
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- A Russian Maritime Territorial preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed on July 18.
					 Gribakov, chairman of the Maritime Territorial Association for Friendship with the DPRK, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and conduct brisk activities in support of the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: Brazilian Organizations Observe Demise Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Brazilian Organizations Observe Demise Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Brazilian organizations posted write-ups on their websites with a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung and his photos between July 3 and 8 on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted articles titled "On the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung" and "For global independence".
					
					 The articles said the Korean people and other progressive people are looking back with deep emotion on the life of the President on July 8, introducing in detail his ideological and theoretical exploits and feats in building the party, state and army.
					
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea posted articles under the subtitles of "People are heaven and teacher", "Finding himself among the people all his life" and "Father of people" under the headline of "The leader and people".
					
					 The articles covered some of the stories about his loving care and devotion to the people to introduce the noble outlook on the people by him who made a long and rough on-the-spot guidance for the people throughout his life.
					
					 The Brazilian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il said in an article titled "Noble life of a peerlessly great man shining with his last autograph" the autography the President signed on the document related to national reunification during the last moments of his life showed his noble life through which he devoted his all to the cause of national reunification.

articles.title: Joint Seminar Held in Nepal
articles.content:
Joint Seminar Held in Nepal
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Political parties, public and friendship organizations and Juche idea study groups of Nepal held a joint seminar on July 16 in Katmandu on the 63rd anniversary of the great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and in the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The joint seminar was attended by Deputy Prime Minister and Minister for Women, Children and Social Welfare C.P. Mainali, general secretary of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), the secretary general of the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Committee of Nepal, Manju Ratna Sakya, deputy director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea and chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association, Phanindra Raj Pant, secretary general of the Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics, and other figures of political parties, organizations and Juche idea study organizations and other masses of Nepal.
					
					 Speakers said the servicepersons and people of the DPRK dealt a shameful defeat to the U.S. imperialists for the first time in history under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung, noting that the exploits the President performed by leading the war to victory are recognized by the world.
					
					 They praised Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as the most veteran statesmen and prominent leaders of the cause of global independence who built the DPRK into a political and military power and full-fledged nuclear weapons state.
					
					 They said the Nepali people sincerely wish the Korean people great achievements in their struggle to carry out the decision made at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea under the outstanding and tested leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Urge U.S. to Drop Foolish Daydream
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Urge U.S. to Drop Foolish Daydream
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on July 14, denouncing the U.S. imperialists' reckless moves to stifle the DPRK.
					 The statement said the Iraqi war fact-finding committee established by the British government in 2009 released a report proving the illegality and unreasonableness of the Iraqi war launched by the U.S. and that this again shows the U.S. is the root cause of state-sponsored terrorism, human rights abuses and all misfortune in the world.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The U.S. deserves stern punishment of mankind as a hideous war criminal state and human rights abuser.
					
					 But yet, it went so impudent as to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK over its "human rights issue."
					
					 The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can invade and bring down the DPRK.
					
					 It should get awakened from its foolish dream.
					
					 The DPRK would continue bolstering up its war deterrence with nuclear force as pivot.
					
					 This would help defend peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 The U.S. should not forget that the DPRK is a nuclear weapons state.

articles.title: Austrian Body Denounces S. Korean Regimes' Crimes against Humanity
articles.content:
Austrian Body Denounces S. Korean Regimes' Crimes against Humanity
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Youth Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Austria sent a letter of protest to the south Korean Embassy in Vienna on July 18 in protest against the puppet regime's group allurement and abduction of DPRK citizens.
					 The letter said:
					
					 We bitterly condemn the south Korean authorities' inhuman allurement and abduction and demand they send back the DPRK citizens to their hometown where their parents are waiting for them.
					
					 With nothing can the south Korean authorities justify their unethical behavior as they are turning down the elementary demand of the parents to know about the safety of their beloved children and to see them. 
					
					 We once again urge the south Korean authorities to make apology to the international community for their allurement and abduction and send back the DPRK citizens without delay.

articles.title: Uruguayan Paper Introduces S. Korean People's Struggle against Decision on THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
Uruguayan Paper Introduces S. Korean People's Struggle against Decision on THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Uruguayan paper La Juventud on July 16 reported the news of the south Korean people's struggle against the decision on the deployment of THAAD.
					 It said:
					
					 At a time when the voices protesting against the decision on THAAD deployment are heard from every place of south Korea, the puppet prime minister and the defense minister of south Korea appeared in Songju County, North Kyongsang Province to hold a briefing on July 15.
					
					 The enraged inhabitants pelted eggs and water bottles at them.
					
					 The suit of the "prime minister" was stained with eggs all over and the briefing was suspended.
					
					 The puppet prime minister and suite members were cooped up in a bus by the attack of the protesters.
					
					 The paper carried photos of the south Korean people pelting eggs and water bottles at the puppet prime minister and suite members.

articles.title: Acto central por 70o aniversario de fundacion de FDRP
articles.content:
Acto central por 70o aniversario de fundacion de FDRP
Pyongyang, 22 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 21 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 70o aniversario de la fundacion del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria (FDRP). 
					El FDRP, fundado por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, es la organizacion de frente unido pannacional que refleja correctamente la demanda de la revolucion en desarrollo y la aspiracion comun de los partidos politicos, entidades sociales y habitantes de distintos estratos patrioticos y democraticos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar que desean lograr la soberania nacional en ambito nacional y cumplir la causa de reunificacion de la patria con las fuerzas unidas. 
					
					Asistieron al acto Kim Yong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, Ro Tu Chol, el presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, los miembros de la Presidencia del Comite Central del FDRP, los funcionarios de entidades sociales, ministerios, organos centrales y de rama interesada, los ex presos de largas condenas no abjurados, los trabajadores capitalinos y los compatriotas en ultramar. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					El orador recordo que la fundacion hace ahora 70 anos del FDRP por el Presidente Kim Il Sung fue un acontecimiento historico que trajo un viraje para prevenir la perpetuacion de la division del territorio nacional impuesta por las fuerzas extranjeras, lograr la soberania e independencia completas de la nacion y reunificar la patria. 
					
					El Presidente presento la original idea y linea de fundar una organizacion de frente unido democratico nacional agrupando a los partidos politicos, entidades sociales y habitantes patrioticos y democraticos y convoco el 22 de julio del 35 (1946) de la Era Juche en Pyongyang la conferencia de representantes de partidos politicos y entidades sociales democraticos del Norte de Corea, menciono y continuo:
					
					Cuando se creo una grave crisis que podia prolongar la division nacional debido al intento de los imperialistas norteamericanos y la camarilla titere de Syngman Rhee de crear un "gobierno aparte mediante elecciones separadas", el gran Lider hizo celebrar en abril de 1948 en esta capital la historica conferencia conjunta de representantes de partidos politicos y entidades sociales del Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					El 26 de junio de 1949, convoco una reunion con la participacion de los representantes de mas de 70 partidos politicos y entidades sociales del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar y en esta ocasion fundo el FDRP, de modo que se preparara la garantia para desarrollar en una etapa mas alta el movimiento del frente unido nacional. 
					
					Desde su fundacion, de acuerdo con su mision y deber, el FDRP viene escribiendo una cronica orgullosa y victoriosa llamando a toda la nacion a la lucha patriotica por la reunificacion. 
					
					Es definitiva la victoria de la causa de reunificacion de Corea, gracias a la destacada y probada orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Llegan a RPDC provisiones donadas por Rusia
articles.content:
Llegan a RPDC provisiones donadas por Rusia
Pyongyang, 22 de julio (ACNC) -- El gobierno de la Federacion Rusa dona otra vez a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea las provisiones por conducto del Programa Mundial de Alimento, como lo hizo en diciembre del ano pasado.
					El dia 20 llegaron al Puerto de Nampho los alimentos entregados.
					
					El encargado de negocios a.i. y los miembros de la embajada rusa y de la representacion de la susodicha organizacion internacional en Corea vieron el dia 22 el proceso de descarga de alimentos.
					
					La donacion de alimentos por parte del gobierno ruso contribuira a desarrollar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion bilaterales.

articles.title: CNCDP llama a la lucha pannacional contra ubicacion de THAAD
articles.content:
CNCDP llama a la lucha pannacional contra ubicacion de THAAD
Pyongyang, 22 de julio (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz, en su declaracion publicada el dia 22, llamo a todos los coreanos en el interior y exterior del pais a levantarse como un solo hombre en la lucha por frustrar el criminal intento de la banda surcoreana de Park Geun-hye de emplazar el THAAD en el suelo surcoreano.
					El portavoz menciono que en estos tiempos, en el Sur de Corea se intensifica cada dia mas la lucha masiva de los habitantes de distintos estratos contra el proceder vendepatria de la camarilla de Park Geun-hye que decidio desplegar en suelo surcoreano el THAAD de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas, y continuo:
					
					Esto es la explosion de colera y odio a la banda de Park Geun-hye que enloquecida por el enfrentamiento fratricida, el servilismo proyanqui y la traicion a la patria, convierte el territorio nacional y toda la nacion en victimas de la guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y busca nueva guerra fria en la region del Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					El CNCDP denuncia categoricamente en nombre de toda la nacion coreana esa conducta proyanqui estigmatizandola como imperdonable acto traidor. 
					
					Debido a la decision sobre la ubicacion de THAAD, el Sur de Corea se convierte en la avanzada base nuclear y fuente de guerra nuclear de EE.UU., que persigue el objetivo de tomar la hegemonia mundial, y se torna real y visible la crisis de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					La traidora Park Geun-hye esta desesperada por salir del destino de arruinamiento y realizar la ambicion de enfrentamiento fratricida, a cambio de haber vendido los intereses nacionales a su amo norteamericano. Pero, ella no puede eludir la destruccion final por su abultado expediente criminal. 
					
					Estaria muy equivocada si ella piensa que con la chatarra como THAAD, podria evitar el fuego de justicia de la RPDC. Esto es lo que debe saber esa traidora.
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad, manifestamos el apoyo total y firme solidaridad con la justa lucha del pueblo surcoreano por prevenir el peligro de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana, desmantelar los pertrechos mortiferos y bases militares de EE.UU. y preservar la paz y estabilidad de la region del Nordeste Asiatico.
